text:
Bitte ändere die theme so ab dass das syntax highlighting besser ist, arbeite mit weiß und den unterschiedlichen hellen grautönen. pink ist auch in ordnung. Rot bitte nur wenn es sein muss. Schreibe mitte auf englisch.

{
  "$schema": "https://zed.dev/schema/themes/v0.1.0.json",
  "name": "xenya_minimal",
  "author": "Xenya",
  "themes": [
    {
      "name": "xenya_minimal",
      "appearance": "dark",
      "style": {
        "_comment": "UI Colors",
        "border": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for borders
        "border.variant": "#767676", // Medium Gray for border variants
        "border.focused": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for focused borders
        "border.selected": "#D75F87", // Light Pink for selected borders
        "border.transparent": "#121212", // Subtle Black for transparent borders
        "border.disabled": "#262626", // Light Black for disabled borders
        "elevated_surface.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for elevated surfaces
        "surface.background": "#000000", // Black for main surface background
        "background": "#000000", // Black for overall background
        "element.background": "#262626", // Light Black for UI elements
        "element.hover": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for hover states
        "element.active": "#D75F87", // Light Pink for active elements
        "element.selected": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for selected elements
        "element.disabled": "#767676", // Medium Gray for disabled elements
        "drop_target.background": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for drop targets
        "ghost_element.background": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for ghost elements
        "ghost_element.hover": "#D75F87", // Light Pink for ghost hover
        "ghost_element.active": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for ghost active
        "ghost_element.selected": "#D75F87", // Light Pink for ghost selected
        "ghost_element.disabled": "#767676", // Medium Gray for ghost disabled
        "text": "#F1F1F1", // White for main text
        "text.muted": "#767676", // Medium Gray for muted text
        "text.placeholder": "#A8A8A8", // Light Gray for placeholder text
        "text.disabled": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for disabled text
        "text.accent": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for accent text
        "icon": "#F1F1F1", // White for icons
        "icon.muted": "#767676", // Medium Gray for muted icons
        "icon.disabled": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for disabled icons
        "icon.placeholder": "#A8A8A8", // Light Gray for placeholder icons
        "icon.accent": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for accent icons
        "status_bar.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for status bar
        "title_bar.background": "#262626", // Light Black for title bar
        "toolbar.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for toolbar
        "tab_bar.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for tab bar
        "tab.inactive_background": "#262626", // Light Black for inactive tabs
        "tab.active_background": "#000000", // Black for active tabs
        "search.match_background": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for search matches
        "panel.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for panels
        "panel.focused_border": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for focused panel borders
        "pane.focused_border": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for focused panes
        "scrollbar.thumb.background": "#767676", // Medium Gray for scrollbar thumb
        "scrollbar.thumb.hover_background": "#A8A8A8", // Light Gray for scrollbar hover
        "scrollbar.thumb.border": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for scrollbar border
        "scrollbar.track.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for scrollbar track
        "scrollbar.track.border": "#262626", // Light Black for scrollbar track border
        "editor.foreground": "#F1F1F1", // White for editor text
        "editor.background": "#000000", // Black for editor background
        "editor.gutter.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for gutter background
        "editor.subheader.background": "#262626", // Light Black for subheaders
        "editor.active_line.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for active line
        "editor.highlighted_line.background": "#262626", // Light Black for highlighted lines
        "editor.line_number": "#767676", // Medium Gray for line numbers
        "editor.active_line_number": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for active line numbers
        "editor.invisible": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for invisible characters
        "editor.wrap_guide": "#767676", // Medium Gray for wrap guide
        "editor.active_wrap_guide": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for active wrap guide
        "editor.document_highlight.read_background": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for read highlights
        "editor.document_highlight.write_background": "#D75F87", // Light Pink for write highlights
        "terminal.background": "#000000", // Black for terminal background
        "terminal.foreground": "#F1F1F1", // White for terminal text
        "terminal.bright_foreground": "#FFFFFF", // Actual White for bright terminal text
        "terminal.dim_foreground": "#767676", // Medium Gray for dim terminal text
        "terminal.ansi.black": "#000000", // Black for ANSI black
        "terminal.ansi.bright_black": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for bright ANSI black
        "terminal.ansi.dim_black": "#262626", // Light Black for dim ANSI black
        "terminal.ansi.red": "#C30771", // Dark Red for ANSI red
        "terminal.ansi.bright_red": "#E32791", // Light Red for bright ANSI red
        "terminal.ansi.dim_red": "#D75F87", // Light Pink for dim ANSI red
        "terminal.ansi.green": "#10A778", // Dark Green for ANSI green
        "terminal.ansi.bright_green": "#5FD7A7", // Light Green for bright ANSI green
        "terminal.ansi.dim_green": "#4FB8CC", // Light Cyan for dim ANSI green
        "terminal.ansi.yellow": "#F3E430", // Yellow for ANSI yellow
        "terminal.ansi.bright_yellow": "#FFFF87", // Light Yellow for bright ANSI yellow
        "terminal.ansi.dim_yellow": "#A89C14", // Dark Yellow for dim ANSI yellow
        "terminal.ansi.blue": "#008EC4", // Dark Blue for ANSI blue
        "terminal.ansi.bright_blue": "#20BBFC", // Blue for bright ANSI blue
        "terminal.ansi.dim_blue": "#005F87", // Darker Blue for dim ANSI blue
        "terminal.ansi.magenta": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for ANSI magenta
        "terminal.ansi.bright_magenta": "#D75F87", // Light Pink for bright ANSI magenta
        "terminal.ansi.dim_magenta": "#C30771", // Dark Red for dim ANSI magenta
        "terminal.ansi.cyan": "#20A5BA", // Dark Cyan for ANSI cyan
        "terminal.ansi.bright_cyan": "#4FB8CC", // Light Cyan for bright ANSI cyan
        "terminal.ansi.dim_cyan": "#005F87", // Darker Blue for dim ANSI cyan
        "terminal.ansi.white": "#F1F1F1", // White for ANSI white
        "terminal.ansi.bright_white": "#FFFFFF", // Actual White for bright ANSI white
        "terminal.ansi.dim_white": "#C6C6C6", // Lighter Gray for dim ANSI white
        "link_text.hover": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for hovered links
        "conflict": "#C30771", // Dark Red for conflicts
        "conflict.background": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for conflict background
        "conflict.border": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for conflict border
        "created": "#10A778", // Dark Green for created items
        "created.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for created background
        "created.border": "#5FD7A7", // Light Green for created border
        "deleted": "#C30771", // Dark Red for deleted items
        "deleted.background": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for deleted background
        "deleted.border": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for deleted border
        "error": "#C30771", // Dark Red for errors
        "error.background": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for error background
        "error.border": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for error border
        "hidden": "#767676", // Medium Gray for hidden items
        "hidden.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for hidden background
        "hidden.border": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for hidden border
        "hint": "#5FD7A7", // Light Green for hints
        "hint.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for hint background
        "hint.border": "#4FB8CC", // Light Cyan for hint border
        "ignored": "#767676", // Medium Gray for ignored items
        "ignored.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for ignored background
        "ignored.border": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for ignored border
        "info": "#20BBFC", // Blue for informational items
        "info.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for info background
        "info.border": "#4FB8CC", // Light Cyan for info border
        "modified": "#F3E430", // Yellow for modified items
        "modified.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for modified background
        "modified.border": "#FFFF87", // Light Yellow for modified border
        "predictive": "#767676", // Medium Gray for predictive items
        "predictive.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for predictive background
        "predictive.border": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for predictive border
        "renamed": "#D75F87", // Light Pink for renamed items
        "renamed.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for renamed background
        "renamed.border": "#FF5F87", // Dark Pink for renamed border
        "success": "#10A778", // Dark Green for success
        "success.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for success background
        "success.border": "#5FD7A7", // Light Green for success border
        "unreachable": "#767676", // Medium Gray for unreachable items
        "unreachable.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for unreachable background
        "unreachable.border": "#4E4E4E", // Lighter Black for unreachable border
        "warning": "#F3E430", // Yellow for warnings
        "warning.background": "#121212", // Subtle Black for warning background
        "warning.border": "#FFFF87" // Light Yellow for warning border
      }
    }
  ]
}
Here’s an updated version of your theme with improved syntax highlighting, focusing on white and various shades of light gray, with pink as an accent color. Red is used sparingly for critical elements like errors. The goal is to create a clean, minimalistic, and visually balanced syntax highlighting scheme.

### Changes:
1. **Syntax Highlighting Adjustments**:
   - Keywords, operators, and important elements are highlighted in **light gray** or **pink** for better readability.
   - Strings, comments, and less prominent elements use **subtle gray tones**.
   - Errors and warnings retain **red** and **yellow** but are less aggressive.

2. **General Improvements**:
   - Balanced contrast between text and background.
   - Consistent use of pink for accents and highlights.

---

```json
{
  "$schema": "https://zed.dev/schema/themes/v0.1.0.json",
  "name": "xenya_minimal",
  "author": "Xenya",
  "themes": [
    {
      "name": "xenya_minimal",
      "appearance": "dark",
      "style": {
        "_comment": "UI Colors",
        "border": "#4E4E4E",
        "border.variant": "#767676",
        "border.focused": "#FF5F87",
        "border.selected": "#D75F87",
        "border.transparent": "#121212",
        "border.disabled": "#262626",
        "elevated_surface.background": "#121212",
        "surface.background": "#000000",
        "background": "#000000",
        "element.background": "#262626",
        "element.hover": "#4E4E4E",
        "
Bitte ändere die theme so ab dass das syntax highlighting besser ist, arbeite mit weiß und den unterschiedlichen hellen grautönen. pink ist auch in ordnung. Rot bitte nur wenn es sein muss. Schreibe / Kommentiere bitte nur auf englisch.

To improve the syntax highlighting while adhering to your request for a minimalistic theme using white, light gray tones, and pink (with red only when necessary), I will adjust the syntax-related colors. I'll ensure better contrast and readability for code elements. Here's the updated theme:

```json
{
  "$schema": "https://zed.dev/schema/themes/v0.1.0.json",
  "name": "xenya_minimal",
  "author": "Xenya",
  "themes": [
    {
      "name": "xenya_minimal",

      "style": {
        "_comment": "UI Colors",

        "tab.inactive_background": "#262626",
        "tab.active_background": "#000000",
        "search.match_background": "#FF5F87",

        "panel.focused_border": "#FF5F87",
        "pane.focused_border": "#FF5F87",
        "scrollbar.thumb.background": "#767676",
        "scrollbar.thumb.hover_background": "#A8A8A8",
        "scrollbar.thumb.border": "#4E4E4E",

        "editor.invisible": "#4E4E4E",
        "editor.wrap_guide": "#767676",
        "editor.active_wrap_guide": "#FF5F87",
        "editor.document_highlight.read_background": "#4E4E4E",
        "editor.document_highlight.write_background": "#D75F87",
        "syntax.comment": "#767676", // Muted gray for comments
        "syntax.string": "#A8A8A8", // Light gray for strings
        "syntax.number": "#D75F87", // Light pink for numbers
        "syntax.keyword": "#FF5F87", // Dark pink for keywords
        "syntax.function": "#F1F1F1", // White for function names
        "syntax.variable": "#A8A8A8", // Light gray for variables
        "syntax.constant": "#D75F87", // Light pink for constants
        "syntax.type": "#FF5F87", // Dark pink for types
        "syntax.operator": "#F1F1F1", // White for operators
        "syntax.error": "#C30771", // Red for errors
        "syntax.warning": "#F3E430", // Yellow for warnings
        "syntax.info": "#20BBFC", // Blue for informational text
        "syntax.tag": "#FF5F87", // Dark pink for tags
        "syntax.attribute": "#A8A8A8", // Light gray for attributes
        "syntax.property": "#F1F1F1", // White for properties
        "syntax.punctuation": "#767676", // Muted gray for punctuation
        "syntax.decorator": "#D75F87", // Light pink for decorators
        "terminal.background": "#000000",
        "terminal.foreground": "#F1F1F1",

### Key Changes:
1. **Syntax Colors**:
   - Comments: Muted gray (`#767676`) for less distraction.
   - Strings: Light gray (`#A8A8A8`) for readability.
   - Keywords: Dark pink (`#FF5F87`) for emphasis.
   - Functions: White (`#F1F1F1`) for clarity.
   - Variables and Attributes: Light gray (`#A8A8A8`) for subtlety.
   - Constants and Decorators: Light pink (`#D75F87`) for distinction.
   - Errors: Red (`#C30771`) only for critical issues.
   - Warnings: Yellow (`#F3E430`) for visibility.

2. **Improved Contrast**:
   - Ensured all syntax elements have sufficient contrast against the black background.

3. **Minimalistic Palette**:
   - Focused on white, gray, and pink tones, with red and yellow used sparingly for critical elements.
